name: Pectoralis major
proximalAttachment: Clavicular head: anterior surface of medial half of clavicle
Sternocostal head: anterior surface of sternum, superior six costal cartilages, aponeurosis of external oblique muscle
distalAttachment: Lateral lip of intertubercular sulcus of humerus
mainAction: Acting alone, clavicular head flexes humerus
Sternocostal head extends humerus from the flexed position

name: Pectoralis minor
distalAttachment: Medial border and superior surface of coracoid process of scapula
mainAction: Stabilizes scapula by drawing it inferiorly and anteriorly against thoracic wall

name: Subclavius
proximalAttachment: Junction of 1st rib and its costal cartilage
distalAttachment: Inferior surface of middle third of clavicle

name: Serratus anterior
proximalAttachment: External surfaces of lateral parts of 1st–8th ribs
distalAttachment: Anterior surface of medial border of scapula
mainAction: Protracts scapula and holds it against thoracic wall
